name: Black Diamond Whippet Attachment
description: Wether you're bootpacking an icy ridge or setting up for a descent in no-fall terrain, this attachment brings an additionnal layer of safety by converting your Whippet-ready ski pole into a self-arrest tool.Steel pick features canard wing to add a margin of safety for steep terrain.ClickLock mechanism provides quick and secure attachment to grip on Whippet-ready ski poles.Attaches to any Whippet-ready ski pole.
